mod.name: Agumon
mod.description:
Agumon Mod Test (2021.03.23)
This mod supports Korean, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese.
The translation may be wrong.
If something is unnatural, I would appreciate it if you let me know in the comments.
This mod is based on Digimon Adventure: (2020).
If you haven't seen it, this mod could be a spoiler.
ex) Card image, Event

cards.description: Deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Claw+
cards.description: Deal 7 damage.

cards.name: Digivolution
cards.description:
Retain.
Can be used when the HP is less than 90%. Consumes 6 agumon:courage. Agumon agumon:digivolve into Greymon. At least HP :

cards.description:
Retain.
Can be used when the HP is less than 90%. Consumes 6 agumon:courage. Agumon agumon:digivolve into Greymon. At least HP :

cards.name: Super Digivolution
cards.description:
Retain.
Can only be used while fighting an elite or boss. Consumes 10 agumon:courage. Greymon Super agumon:digivolve into Metalgreymon.

cards.name: Super Digivolution+
cards.description:
Retain.
Can only be used while fighting an elite or boss. Consumes 10 agumon:courage. Greymon Super agumon:digivolve into Metalgreymon.

cards.name: Ultimate Digivolution
cards.description:
Retain.
Can only be used while fighting an elite or boss. Consumes 10 agumon:courage. Metalgreymon Ultimate agumon:digivolve into Wargreymon.

cards.name: Ultimate Digivolution+
cards.description:
Retain.
Can only be used while fighting an elite or boss. Consumes 10 agumon:courage. Metalgreymon Ultimate agumon:digivolve into Wargreymon.

cards.description: Deal 3 damage the number of times Agumon digivolved in this game. Total :

cards.description: Deal 3 damage the number of times Agumon digivolved in this game. Total :

Heal 7 HP.

cards.description: Draw 1 card, gain 3 agumon:courage.

cards.name: Cramped Way
cards.description: Consumes 4 agumon:courage. If there is only one enemy, gain 2 Strength and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Cramped Way+
cards.description: Consumes 4 agumon:courage. If there is only one enemy, gain 3 Strength and draw 1 cards.

cards.name: Data Scan
cards.description: Exhaust 1 card. Gain agumon:courage for 3 times the cost of that card.

cards.name: Data Scan+
cards.description: Exhaust 1 card. Gain agumon:courage for 5 times the cost of that card.

cards.name: Demilitarization
cards.description:
Consumes 2 agumon:courage. Deal 10 damage. Enemy lose 1 Strength.
Exhaust

cards.name: Demilitarization+
cards.description:
Consumes 2 agumon:courage. Deal 13 damage. Enemy lose 2 Strength.
Exhaust

cards.description: Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Fury Claw+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Last Hope
cards.description: Can only be played if there are no cards in your draw pile. Gain 8 agumon:courage .

cards.name: Last Hope+
cards.description: Can only be played if there are no cards in your draw pile. Gain 12 agumon:courage .

cards.name: Posture Correction
cards.description: Gain 9 Block. If you played an Attack, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Posture Correction+
cards.description: Gain 12 Block. If you played an Attack, draw 2 cards.

cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Apply 1 Weak.

cards.description: Deal 12 damage. Apply 2 Weak.

cards.description: Apply 3 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Weakness Analysis+
cards.description: Apply 4 Vulnerable.

cards.description: Consumes 3 agumon:courage. Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies. Apply 1 agumon:burn to ALL enemies.

cards.description: Consumes 3 agumon:courage. Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies. Apply 2 agumon:burn to ALL enemies.

cards.description: Double ALL enemy agumon:burn. Deal -1 damage per agumon:burn to ALL enemy.

cards.name: Big Explosion+
cards.description: Triple ALL enemy agumon:burn. Deal -1 damage per agumon:burn to ALL enemy.

cards.name: Body Slam
cards.description: Can be used when agumon:level is above Champion. Lose 3 HP. Deal 10 damage. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Body Slam+
cards.description: Can be used when agumon:level is above Champion. Lose 3 HP. Deal 13 damage. Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Chase
cards.description:
Consume 3 agumon:courage. Gain [E] .
Exhaust

cards.name: Chase+
cards.description: Consume 3 agumon:courage. Gain [E] .

cards.name: Crisis
cards.description:
If your HP is less than enemy, heal by 10% of the difference.
Exhaust Amount :

cards.name: Crisis+
cards.description:
Innate. If your HP is less than enemy, heal by 10% of the difference.
Exhaust Amount :

cards.name: Devolution
cards.description:
Devolution 1 agumon:level. Lost ALL agumon:courage, heal 20% of MAX HP.
Exhaust

cards.name: Devolution+
cards.description:
Devolution 1 agumon:level. Lost ALL agumon:courage, heal 40% of MAX HP.
Exhaust

cards.name: Emergency Tool
cards.description:
If HP is 25% or less 25%, you can play this card. Consumes 4 agumon:courage. Discards ALL cards. Draw 3 cards, gain [E] [E] [E]
Exhaust.

cards.name: Emergency Tool+
cards.description:
If HP is 25% or less 25%, you can play this card. Consumes 4 agumon:courage. Discards ALL cards. Draw 4 cards, gain [E] [E] [E] [E]
Exhaust.

cards.name: Friend's Leather
cards.description: Consumes 3 agumon:courage. Gain 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Friend's Leather+
cards.description: Consumes 3 agumon:courage. Gain 3 Dexterity.

cards.name: Frontal Defend
cards.description: Can be used when agumon:level is above Champion. Gain 9 Block. If the enemy intends to attack, gain 3 agumon:courage.

cards.name: Frontal Defend+
cards.description: Can be used when agumon:level is above Champion. Gain 12 Block. If the enemy intends to attack, gain 5 agumon:courage.

cards.name: Good Rival
cards.description: If you play 20 or more cards in this battle, gain 7 agumon:courage and gain 3 Strength.

cards.name: Good Rival+
cards.description: If you play 15 or more cards in this battle, gain 10 agumon:courage and gain 6 Strength.

cards.name: Helping Hand
cards.description: Consume 3 agumon:courage. Gain [E] . Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Helping Hand+
cards.description: Consume 3 agumon:courage. Gain [E] [E] . Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Into The Storm
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is discarded from your hand, gain 3 agumon:courage and heal 2 HP.

cards.name: Into The Storm+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is discarded from your hand, gain 3 agumon:courage and heal 5 HP.

cards.name: Physical Shock
cards.description: Lose 2 HP. Remove ALL debuffs for player. Gain 5 agumon:courage.

cards.name: Physical Shock+
cards.description: Lose 2 HP. Remove ALL debuffs for player. Gain 7 agumon:courage.

cards.name: Pressure
cards.description:
Can be used when agumon:level is above Ultimate. Gain 3 agumon:courage, apply 2 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
exhaust

cards.name: Pressure+
cards.description: Can be used when agumon:level is above Ultimate. Gain 3 agumon:courage, apply 2 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Ready for Camping
cards.description: Draw 2 cards, discard 1 card.

cards.name: Ready for Camping+
cards.description: Draw 2 cards, discard 1 card.

cards.description:
Heal hp for 50% of agumon:courage you have. Draw 1 card.
Exhaust
Heal :

cards.name: Rewarding Break+
cards.description:
Heal hp for 100% of agumon:courage you have. Draw 1 card.
Exhaust
Heal :

cards.name: Sign of Evolution
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 agumon:courage.

cards.name: Sign of Evolution+
cards.description: Innate. At the start of your turn, gain 1 agumon:courage.

cards.name: Surprised party
cards.description: For each time you play a card that restores HP, gain [E] .

cards.name: Surprised party+
cards.description: For each time you play a card that restores HP, gain [E] .

cards.name: Trample
cards.description: Can be used when agumon:level is above Champion. Deal 10 damage, Gain 2 agumon:courage per monster in this room. Total :

cards.name: Trample+
cards.description: Can be used when agumon:level is above Champion. Deal 10 damage, Gain 3 agumon:courage per monster in this room. Total :

cards.name: Weakness Point
cards.description: Consumes 3 agumon:courage. Deal 8 damage. If enemy has Weak or Vulnerable, increase it 2.

cards.name: Weakness Point+
cards.description: Consumes 3 agumon:courage. Deal 8 damage. If enemy has Weak or Vulnerable, increase it 4.

cards.name: Absorb Data
cards.description: Consumes 3 agumon:courage. Whenever you attack, heal 1 HP.

cards.name: Absorb Data+
cards.description: Innate. Consumes 3 agumon:courage. Whenever you attack, heal 1 HP.

cards.name: Brave Shield
cards.description: Wargreymon agumon:only. Consumes 2 agumon:courage. At the end of your turn, for each enemy with intent to attack gain 4 block.

cards.name: Brave Shield+
cards.description: Wargreymon agumon:only. Consumes 2 agumon:courage. At the end of your turn, for each enemy with intent to attack gain 5 block.

cards.name: Bulk up
cards.description: Lose 5 Gold. Gain 1 permanent MAX HP.  Something mights happen...

cards.name: Bulk up+
cards.description: Lose 3 Gold. Gain 1 permanent MAX HP.  Something mights happen...

cards.name: Digi Egg
cards.description: Can be used when agumon:level is above Ultimate. Devolve to Rookie heal 30% of MAX hp. Gain 1 permenant MAX HP per each monster in this battle. Amount :

cards.name: Digi Egg+
cards.description: Can be used when agumon:level is above Ultimate. Devolve to Rookie heal 30% of MAX hp. Gain 2 permenant MAX HP per each monster in this battle. Amount :

cards.name: Finisher Blow
cards.description: Consumes 2 agumon:courage. Deal 6 damage for each cards played this turn. Total :

cards.name: Finisher Blow+
cards.description: Consumes 2 agumon:courage. Deal 10 damage for each cards played this turn. Total :

cards.name: Giga Destroyer
cards.description: Metalgreymon agumon:only. Deal 15 twice, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Giga Destroyer+
cards.description: Metalgreymon agumon:only. Deal 19 twice, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Headbutt
cards.description: Consumes 2 agumon:courage. Deal 13 damage. If the enemy intends to attack, it doubles the damage.

cards.name: Headbutt+
cards.description: Consumes 3 agumon:courage. Deal 13 damage. If the enemy intends to attack, it triples the damage.

cards.name: Inherit Dragon
cards.description: Lose ALL agumon:courage. For this turn, as much strength as the lost agumon:courage gain Strength. Amount :

cards.name: Inherit Dragon+
cards.description: Lose ALL agumon:courage. For this turn, as much strength as the lost agumon:courage gain Strength. Amount :

cards.name: One Point Attack
cards.description: Deal 15 damage. If this kills a monster, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: One Point Attack+
cards.description: Deal 21 damage. If this kills a monster, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Over Flowing
cards.description: Gain 1 Strength per 30 MAX HP. Gain :

cards.name: Over Flowing+
cards.description: Gain 1 Strength per 25 MAX HP. Gain :

cards.name: Telecommunication
cards.description: Choose a card from your draw pile and place it into your hand. Its cost is reduced by 1 during this turn.

cards.name: Telecommunication+
cards.description: Innate. Choose a card from your draw pile and place it into your hand. Its cost is reduced by 1 during this turn.

cards.name: Weird Face
cards.description:
Protect enemy attacks 1 time.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Weird Face+
cards.description:
Protect enemy attacks 2 times.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Digivice
relics.description:
At the start of your turn, gain 2 agumon:courage.
At the start of each combat after clearing the Act 1 boss, there is a 60% chance to obtain the Crest Of Courage.
relics.flavorText: The medium that connects Digimon and humans.

relics.name: Dramon Killer
relics.description: If you are an elite or boss room, gain 3 Strength at the start of the battle.
relics.flavorText: It is an unusual weapon that reacts strongly to certain enemies.

relics.name: Ruby Gemstone
relics.description: Gain 250 Gold. At the start of battle, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: Ruby picked up from the edge of a cliff

relics.name: Holly Ring
relics.description: Every time you play 4 cards, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: This is the Holy Ring held by the Holy Digimon.

relics.name: Power of Qinglongmon
relics.description: You can only use when agumon:level is Rookie and battle with Elite or Boss. You can Warp Digivolve to Mega.
relics.flavorText: Qinglongmon shared power for The DigiDestined Child

relics.name: Crest of Courage
relics.description: If agumon has Crest, he can digivolve beyond a Ultimate.

relics.name: Holy Power
relics.flavorText: It is the Power received from the holy Digimon. The light gets stronger as it #yagumon:digivolve .

keywords.name: Agumon:burn
keywords.description: At the end of turn, Enemy lost 10% of MAX HP and Burn is reduce by 1

keywords.name: Agumon:courage
keywords.description: You can do powerful actions to use courage. Even attack cards do not attack, it is treated as an attack card. If you don't have enough Courage, the card will costs 0 and effect becomes 'Gain 1(2) of the Courage'.

keywords.name: Agumon:digivolve
keywords.description: Digimon gets stronger and stronger through digivolution. Crest is required to digivolve beyond Champion.

keywords.name: Agumon:level
keywords.description: Evolutionary stage of Digimon. The order is Rookie - Champion - Ultimate - Mega.

keywords.name: Agumon:only
keywords.description: A card that can only be used by Digimon written on the front. It's created in Deck when you digivolve and disappears when you devolve.
